channel.title: Adding special attacks to PimpScape?
channel.description:
Can someone explain or give me a tut explaining how to do it? I really want special attacks on my server...
BTW, I saw a tut in the RS2 help section thingy, but it was for other servers and I tried it for my server... Doesn't work.
